item.title: I tried using folium
item.description: ## Introduction Recently I tried using folium, a library that displays data on a map, so I tried to summarize it while studying. What is folium FoliumisapythonlibrarythatvisualizesdatawithamapofLeaflet.js. You can take advantage of both python data manipulation and leaflet mapping. Github:https://github.com/python-visualization/folium Documentation:https://python-visualization.github.io/folium/ Install You can install it with pip install. $ pip install folium Let’s display the map! First, display a map of Japan centered on Tokyo Station ([35.681167, 139.767052]) with jupyter.
